citations.narrative:
On June19, 2025, the licensee transported a squirrel monkey across state lines without obtaining a health certificate.
Health certificates are important for ensuring that animals are healthy, fit for travel and appear free of any infectious
disease or physical abnormality that would be a danger to themselves, other animals, and the public. A health certificate
issued by a licensed veterinarian, dated not more than 10 days prior to the transportation, must accompany all non-
human primates.
Correct from this date forward June 23, 2025
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
n

narrative:
2.78(a) 
   
Health certification and identification. 
On June19, 2025, the licensee transported a squirrel monkey across state lines without obtaining a health certificate. 
Health certificates are important for ensuring that animals are healthy, fit for travel and appear free of any infectious 
disease or physical abnormality that would be a danger to themselves, other animals, and the public. A health certificate 
issued by a licensed veterinarian, dated not more than 10 days prior to the transportation, must accompany all non-
human primates.  
 
Correct from this date forward June 23, 2025 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with licensee.
